refnamediv.refpurpose: output CMS_ContentInfo structure in PEM format

refsynopsisdiv.synopsis: int PEM_write_bio_CMS_stream(BIO *out, CMS_ContentInfo *cms, BIO *data, int flags);

refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: PEM_write_bio_CMS_stream() outputs a CMS_ContentInfo structure in PEM format.
It is otherwise identical to the function SMIME_write_CMS().

refsection.title: NOTES
refsection.para: This function is effectively a version of the PEM_write_bio_CMS() supporting streaming.

refsection.title: RETURN VALUES
refsection.para: PEM_write_bio_CMS_stream() returns 1 for success or 0 for failure.
